p: A full validation was carried out according to 2002/657/EC [ 1]. The following parameters were determined: linearity, trueness, repeatability, within-laboratory reproducibility, decision limit (CCα), detection capability (CCβ), selectivity and robustness. The validation was carried out on three different occasions, by two different technicians, using different batches of SPE cartridges and including 21 different poultry muscle samples.
